summary: Makes Uthgerd the Unbroken a drop dead gorgeous Ranger.
descriptionHtml:
Uthgerd the Raging Beauty Ranger

=================================================================

The true credit here goes to foretrenty for his Skyrim NPC Editor which can be found here: http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4554

Uthgerd has actually been one of my favorite followers but she\'s a bit worse for wear in the looks department. I always play a stealthy character and there just aren\'t any really good stealthy followers IMO.

I don\'t know why it took so long to think of doing this and I don\'t think anyone else has either. Anyway, presenting... drumroll please... Uthgerd the Raging Beauty Ranger.

=================================================================

Features:

Fully compatible with Follower Tweaks - Several Flavors by Expired which can be found here: http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3111 Just make sure the Uthgerd esp loads after Follower Tweaks.

Uthgerd is essential.

She is a Ranger - deadly with a bow and competent with blade and shield.
Most importantly, Uthgerd is stealthy as a cobra and if you add some sneak enhanced items she will be even more so. Her skills have been altered to use light armor to further facilitate stealth.

Finally, before you ask, the armor she is wearing in the pic is SilverX10 by Thor925 which can be found here: http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5404

Installation:

Extract and add the Data folder to your skyrim directory.

================================================================

Recommended files:

If you want the full look of the pic you will want to use the following:

Better Females by Bella
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2812

Bright Eyes v1-3 by Skree000
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2464

===============================================================

Credits:

Special thanks to:
Thor925 my modding mentor
foretrenty for his Skyrim NPC Editor 0.52
Expired for his Follower Tweaks mod
author: motseer
